Name: Geno The Fallen King
About the game: Geno the Fallen King is a fast-paced 2D platformer with fluid movement and easy to master mechanics. Sprint and lunge through vibrant environments and satisfying collectibles. With tight and responsive movement you can blast your way through the open, secret filled levels. Speed and skill will earn you even more rewards. When you master this game you will know.
